name: Understanding UK Taxation
description: This quiz tests your knowledge on the basic rate of income tax in the UK, National Insurance Contributions, and the tax-free personal allowance for the tax year 2024/25.

info.title: Basic Rate of Income Tax in the UK
info.content: The current basic rate of income tax in the UK is 20%. This rate is applied to taxable income within a certain range, with individuals earning above this threshold subject to higher tax rates on additional income.

info.title: Understanding National Insurance Contributions
info.content: National Insurance Contributions are deducted from your earnings. These contributions are mandatory payments made by employees, employers, and self-employed individuals to fund various state benefits, including the state pension, healthcare, and unemployment benefits.

info.title: Tax-Free Personal Allowance in the UK
info.content: The tax-free personal allowance in the UK for the tax year 2024/25 is £12,570. This allowance represents the amount of income an individual can earn before they start paying income tax.
